text: The Syracuse Stallions are a professional basketball team in Syracuse, New York, and members of The Basketball League (TBL). ==History== The Syracuse Stallions were founded in 2017 by Mike Sugamosto, Josh Winans, and Jim Evans. The team joined the semiprofessional American Basketball Association for the 2018 season.. The team had two successful seasons, including championship wins. and decided to become a professional basketball team. On May 1, 2020, Evelyn Magley, CEO of The Basketball League (TBL), announced the Stallions were approved to join the league for the 2021 season. ==References== Category:Sports in Syracuse, New York Category:Basketball teams in New York (state) Category:The Basketball League teams Category: 2018 establishments in New York (state) Category:Basketball teams established in 2017
title: Syracuse Stallions
